reporter_caption.center: PACIFIC INSURANCE CO. v. CORDOVA CHEMICAL COMPANY, 470 Mich. 884 (2004)

caption.center: PACIFIC INSURANCE COMPANY, Plaintiff, v. CORDOVA CHEMICAL COMPANY OF

opinion.opinion_text:
SC: 125531, COA: 248778, Muskegon CC: 87-023270-CK.
On order of the Court, the application for leave to appeal the October 15, 2003 order of the Court of Appeals is considered and, pursuant to MCR 7.302(G)(1), in lieu of granting leave to appeal, we VACATE the October 15, 2003 order of the Court of Appeals and we REMAND this case to the Court of Appeals for plenary consideration of the May 23, 2003 claim of appeal and the June 13, 2003 claim of cross appeal.
